listitem.para: This document should not be used as a tutorial for RichFaces framework since it is created to describe the issues caused by migration process
It is assumed that you are familiar with basic tenets of RichFaces framework. If you are newbie in RichFaces you can find RichFaces documentation on RichFaces project page.
Concepts related to Web or application servers configuration, JSF, JSF implementations are beyond the scope of this document
